sheetDetailsList.queryByDate: SELECT date AS 'Date', SUM(num_cases_imfl + num_cases_beer) AS 'Total Cases', SUM(form_3) AS 'Form 3 (In Amount)' FROM trip_details td LEFT JOIN outlet_master om ON td.outlet_code = om.outlet_code AND om.depo_name = :depo GROUP BY date  HAVING date = :date
sheetDetailsList.queryByDateRange: SELECT date AS 'Date', SUM(num_cases_imfl + num_cases_beer) AS 'Total Cases', SUM(form_3) AS 'Form 3 (In Amount)' FROM trip_details td LEFT JOIN outlet_master om ON td.outlet_code = om.outlet_code AND om.depo_name = :depo GROUP BY date  HAVING date between :startDate and :endDate
